# ScopedReadStream.Position property

Gets or sets the position within the current stream. An exception is always thrown.

```csharp
public override long Position { get; set; }
```

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| NotSupportedException | The stream does not support seeking. |
